name: Cost-Effective Solutions
tag_list: zos, systems-programming, ibm, mainframe, ibm-mainframe, mvs, it, information-security, data-security, security, top-secret-security, tss, ca-tss, ca-top
overview:
COST-EFFECTIVE SOLUTIONS was established as a part-time venture in 1974 by Bruce Grant, an ex-IBMer. It became a full-time business in late 1983, and was incorporated in 1989. Although still specializing in IBM mainframe Systems Programming (z/OS, OS/390, MVS), COST-EFFECTIVE SOLUTIONS Inc. has since expanded into

  • Project Management and Data Center Management
  • Information Security
  • Network Design, Configuration, and Implementation (WAN and LAN),
  • Small Business Technical and Accounting consulting,
  • Website design, upgrades, and troubleshooting
  • Digital Telephone System installation and configuration.

== company motto/description: “Solving business problems with technology”

Previous clients:

  • New United Motors Manufacturing Inc. (NUMMI), Fremont, CA
  • Visa USA, San Mateo, CA
  • Pacific Gas & Electric Company, San Francisco (twice)
  • The Gap, Inc., San Bruno & Rocklin, CA
  • Pacific Stock Exchange, San Francisco
  • Behring Diagnostics Inc., San Jose & Fremont, CA
  • Roche Biosciences Inc., Palo Alto, CA
  • Syva Co., Palo Alto & San Jose, CA
  • Syntex (USA) Inc., Palo Alto, CA (five times)
  • [an unamed, $multi-billion, financial institution, S.F. Bay Area (non-disclosure still in effect)]
  • Calif. State Automobile Assn. Inter-Insurance Bureau, San Francisco (twice)
  • DeltaNet,Inc., San Francisco
